text: well what we know Simon is that this
morning in the European Parliament we've
been told from sources there that mr.
wolf collapsed inside the Parliament
complex not in the chamber itself we
understand it may have been just outside
so close to the chamber he was
immediately attended to by Russia's from
the Parliament security staff there they
took him to a room in the parliament
where there are medical facilities and
he was then subsequently taken to
hospital in Strasbourg where he is
receiving treatment now what has been
reported is a statement from Nigel
Farage who said that there was an
altercation that took place during a
meeting of you keep em eps in the
parliament this morning and that steven
wolf subsequently collapse he says Mr
Farage says that Steven wolves condition
is serious and there have been some
other reports that in that meeting it
was quite heated and that something may
have taken place there but as we
understand it mr. wolf receiving
treatment but in a serious condition
